column4: ...so no one else having problems with Pidgin connecting to AOL/AIM tonight but me?
i know there was some problems with yahoo a while back but haven't heard anything about aim
@snakdoc, yet Yahoo's been broken for a while now, but I don't really use it...
i updated it and it fixed i get link one sec
i have 9.04 but pidgin should still be same
if you see that prompt then you must already have it installed...
thais will let you get the newest http://www.pidgin.im/download/ubuntu/
no... did you install the desktop version or the server edition?
with that i am able to run 2.5.8
@snakdoc, installing now....wasn't aware Pidgin was releasing their own .deb's now
i came across it when yahoo had its errors
